external_games.name: Eden of Ikemen: Love in a Lost World

name: Eden of Ikemen: Love in a Lost World
storyline:
The luxurious cruise ship that you're on sinks. The 14 survivors, including you, are washed up on a desert island. Will you die or survive?

Together with charming ikemen with unique personalities, you face the island's conspiracies. Escape is your goal, but dangerous traps set by an unknown perpetrator keeps coming your way. What if an intricately designed trap is responsible for the sinking of the luxurious cruise ship!? Will the path you're on lead you to the love of your life? Unravel the mystery on the desert island with plenty of ikemen and get out of there alive!
summary:
Remake of Dead or Love with a reworked translation.

A free to play otome game with the theme survival and romance on a desert island.
